articles.description:
Banik Ostrava celebrated their 100th anniversary this evening but there was no sentimentality from Ange Postecoglou’s Celtic who overcame the Czech test with a 4-2 win. Celtic conceded early on but after finding an equaliser through Kyogo Furuhashi dominated large portions of the fixture. A long-range stunner from Matt O’Riley had the Bhoys ahead before ...

articles.description: There is a reason why veteran troops are amongst the most feared soldiers on the battlefield. It’s because they are reliable under fire, carrying with them the experience of shooting at the enemy as well as being fired upon. Back in the days of the Ancients, the most feared armies were those which had already […]
articles.title: Pre-Season Strength And The Confidence Of Champions Has Celtic Looking Good.

articles.description: Giorgos Giakoumakis has become famed for scoring goals with a first time finish. Indeed, all but two of his Celtic strikes have been netted with a one touch strike. That incredible finishing ability looks set to continue as the Greek striker converted Anthony Ralston’s delightful cross with an acrobatic first time volley against Benik Ostrava Read More
articles.title: Video: Giakoumakis Continues One Touch Finishing With Outstanding Goal

articles.description: What in God’s name is Joe Hart doing at the moment? He and Jullien and their complete lack of concentration cost us a goal against Rapid. Tonight, early in the game, a slack pass from Jota saw Hart caught cold … almost at the halfway line. That was shocking. We very nearly conceded from it. […]
articles.title: For God’s Sake Joe Hart, Stay In Your Penalty Area

articles.description: THE movement of Kyogo has left many a defender dizzy since he burst onto the scene at Celtic last season, but his speed is such that it is often difficult even for his own teammates to keep up with him.
articles.title: Kyogo is even a step ahead of Celtic teammates says David Turnbull, as he relishes link-up with striker next season

articles.description: WITH the greatest of respect to MK Dons, the rise of their former captain Matt O’Riley has been a remarkable one over the past six months or so. Not only has the young midfielder become an integral member of the Celtic squad, but he may well find himself at the World Cup come the end of the year.
articles.title: Matt O’Riley aiming to cap off Celtic rise with World Cup place – with a little help from Morten Wieghorst

articles.description: SCOTT BAIN is set to remain at Celtic this season due to Champions League ruling.
articles.title: Scott Bain's Celtic summer transfer conundrum as Champions League ruling set to make his decision

articles.description: CELTIC continue pre-season preparations with a trip to face Banik Ostrava on Wednesday.
articles.title: Celtic vs Banik Ostrava: TV channel, live stream, kick-off time

articles.description: TOM ROGIC has been pictured in Sydney with uncertainty surrounding his future.
articles.title: Tom Rogic transfer latest as Celtic hero pictured following Australia boss Graham Arnold's 'concerns'

articles.description: CELTIC will reportedly hold contract talks with St Mirren youngster Dylan Reid today.
articles.title: Dylan Reid to Celtic latest as Ange Postecoglou to sell move to St Mirren youngster

articles.description: JAMES FORREST is a player who, it would be fair to say, has sometimes split opinion among the Celtic fanbase during his long career at the club. For a winger, it comes with the territory.
articles.title: James Forrest not content with making up the numbers at Celtic as winger looks to become main player for Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: KYOGO has set himself a minimum target of 20 goals next season as he looks to wrest the title of Scotland’s top scorer away from teammate Giorgos Giakoumakis.
articles.title: Kyogo sets goal target as he vows to oust Celtic teammate from top of scoring charts

articles.description: CELTIC’s wait for the glamour of top-level European competition has been a long one, with the fans deprived of those famous group stage matches at Celtic Park for five years. Their wait will soon be over, as will Joe Hart’s, who has gone even longer without tasting the business end of the Champions League.
articles.title: Joe Hart says Celtic will take on Europe’s best on their own terms with Champions League wait almost over

articles.description: ANGE POSTECOGLOU has confirmed that Celtic are interested in bringing St Mirren youngster Dylan Reid to the club for their B team, but that his focus is firmly on strengthening his first-team as he continues to work on a ‘couple’ of targets.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou focused on first-team recruits as Celtic make move for youngster Dylan Reid

articles.description: Ismaila Soro has departed Celtic on loan after linking up with Portuguese outfit FC Arouca.
articles.title: Celtic's Ismaila Soro joins FC Arouca on loan as midfielder departs Parkhead

articles.description: IT didn’t quite have the needle of a certain previous meeting between these sides, and thankfully there were no bottles thrown from the crowd either, but Celtic needed a fair bit of bottle to come through this supposed friendly against Rapid Vienna with a hard-fought 3-3 draw.
articles.title: Celtic settle for draw in 'friendly' against old foes Rapid Vienna as Ange Postecoglou's men step it up

articles.description:
HART SHOWING WHY HE IS NUMBER ONE


  Benjamin Siegrist moved to Celtic in the summer after being released from Dundee United, and as he signed on the dotted line at Parkhead, he confirmed that he would be giving his all to challenge Joe Hart for the No1 jersey. Going by today’s showing it certainly looks like Hart will be up for the fight after he pulled off a string of impressive saves. The former England international also showed his organisational qualities as he constantly communicated with the defence in front of him. Hart was a key performer last term, and he will need to continue to produce this season. He had a slight error in his 45-minute stint for Rapid Vienna’s first goal, but he will undoubtedly look to blame the slack back pass from Cameron Carter-Vickers.
articles.title: 3 Celtic pre-season talkers as Ange Postecoglou's side draw entertaining friendly against Rapid Vienna

articles.description: MIKEY JOHNSTON has revealed that the Celtic squad have been avid watchers of Love Island during this summer's pre-season training camp.
articles.title: Mikey Johnston reveals Celtic Love Island obsession but ITV show is not for Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: CALLUM MCGREGOR has ditched his protective face mask for the new season after returning today against Rapid Vienna.
articles.title: Callum McGregor ditches Celtic protection mask for new season as skipper returns against Rapid Vienna

articles.description: ANGE POSTECOGLOU has named his Celtic team to take on Rapid Vienna in pre-season.
articles.title: Celtic team news vs Rapid Vienna as Ange Postecoglou names strong starting XI

articles.description: CELTIC have made a bid for St Mirren youngster Dylan Reid, according to reports.
articles.title: Celtic launch bid for St Mirren starlet Dylan Reid after Rangers reports
